body:
Hey guys!

I just got a PS4 a little over a year ago, and Iv'e realized, I have been playing a lot of mc, and not some of the PS4 games! I was wondering if you guys have any fun game suggestions! By the way, I don't like COD, but I do like other games with shooting involved! I mainly enjoy strategy and action games! Thanks for the help! 

Peace!

-C_P

p.s: Is Far Cry 4 any good, i hear a lot of people talking about it at my school! ._.

title: Playstation: good games?

replies.body: GTA V and FC4 are good.
replies.body_tagged: GTA V and FC4 are good.

replies.body:
The last of us, Alien: Isolation, Destiny, Shadow of Mordor, Battlefield 4, New Tomb Raider, Assassin's Creed 4, Final Fantasy: A realm reborn, Metro redux, Watch dogs

Just games that are action and strategy

replies.body:
Get GTA V, Far Cry 4, or Destiny.

Personally, I don't have a PS4. However, I have all the previous consoles. :P If you want any game suggestions for the PS1, PS2, or PS3, come and ask me.

replies.body:
The Last Of Us was one of the best games of 2013.
It has a brilliant story-line and is on the next-gen consoles.
replies.body_tagged:
The Last Of Us was one of the best games of 2013.
It has a brilliant story-line and is on the next-gen consoles.

replies.body:
Ok.

I have a PS4, so here we go:

1. A great game that I started with was The Last Of Us. If you like shooting games that are slow paced but with tons of action, buy it. I recommend it a lot. The multiplayer is great, and it plays at 60fps, which is huge.

2. Another game I am currently playing a lot is Watch Dogs. It is a lot different to any other game around, but is really fun and has a great campaign while also blending decent multiplayer features. There is a lot to do on Watch Dogs - it is a great rival to GTA.

3. There is a free to play shooting game called Blacklight: Retribution which is a multiplayer - only game that is great. Basically, you get the game for free, but if you wish to buy any gun upgrades or armor upgrades, you must pay at a small cost. However, I have a great loadout on that game that I only spent £3.99 on, which is great instead of paying £40 quid+ for the game with free upgrades. It's really fun, and the multiplayer is great, but it is also challenging.


I also recommend that you get The Crew, COD Advanced Warfare, Far Cry 4 and Assassins Creed: Unity as they all look great and would make good Xmas presents.


BiZa :)

replies.body: Get a playstation 2 and play watch dogs

replies.body: Thanks to all of you! I think i'm really interested in Watch Dogs, Far Cry 4, and The last of us! Thanks 4 the help!
